snippet.title: Magic: The Gathering - Puzzle Quest Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Players will engage in pitched conflicts with rival Planeswalkers and monsters through intense match-3 puzzle battles, earning levels and amassing a collection of powerful creatures, spells and artifacts along the way. Developed by Hibernum, Magic: The Gathering - Puzzle Quest adds the extensive universe of the acclaimed TCG to the engrossing gameplay of the Puzzle Quest franchise, as players participate in quests, daily events and tournaments for epic rewards.

Magic: The Gathering - Puzzle Quest will be available worldwide to download for free on the App Store and Google Play on December 10th.  For more information, please visit www.magicpuzzlequest.com.
